title: Crew Show!
description:
This week we bring you more of the usual car news while we opine and deliver stories you wouldn't be comfortable sharing with your aunt.  

Topics this week include...

  • 2015 Corvette Z06
  • Forza Horizon 2
  • The growing dominiance of Über
  • Dual Clutch Transmissions vs fast conventional Automatics
  • Nearly super offensive URLs
  • Throwing rockis at Lamborghini Aventadors
  • Burning DeLoreans
  • Harrassing/Stalking shops that do the TST crew favors
  • Matt's Mustang Project
  • All Cars Go To Heaven
  • Starfield Ceilings
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
